name: 曦Lost girl
description:
In the dark, the girl seems to have returned to her early time,

On the way to escape, beastly men, creepy old ladies, molestation mazes, creepy clowns and ugly baby monsters...

Your name is the same meaning as morning shine, you should choice your life by your own hand.

Here's a story about a girl who was abducted and sold into the mountains to make birth machines for fools....

Find yourself in the process of solving the maze of Dark limbo\Chain limbo\Endure limbo\Lost limbo\Choice limbo

She wanna escape, but the end comes before her leaving...

Escape room + Maze + plot，A RPGmaker solo game.
